article.headline: Elon University 69, UT-Chattanooga 61
article.story: ELON, N.C. (AP) -- Scottie Rice and LeVonn Jordan each scored 13 points to lead Elon to a 69-61 victory over Chattanooga in a Southern Conference game Monday night. Elon, which opened the season with a 2-9 record, won for the 11th time in 14 games. Jackson Atoyebi and Chris Chalko each had 11 points for the Phoenix (13-12, 9-3 Southern Conference), and Brett James had 10. Steve Cherry led the Mocs (15-12, 6-6) with 15 points and 11 rebounds while Jerice Crouch had 13 points. Elon led 34-30 at halftime, then opened the second half with an 11-5 scoring run. The Phoenix led the rest of the game. Chattanooga, which gave up 10 turnovers, forced 17 Phoenix turnovers and outscored Elon 23-6 off turnovers.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.
